DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) ABU accepts two (2) ‘A’ level/IJMB passes one 
(1)  of  which  must  include  
Government/History or Economics.  
(ii) ADSU accepts HND /ND /NCE at Credit/merit 
level in appropriate programmes/subjects  
(iii) COOU accepts NCE (Government) or ND lower 
credit in Public Administration.  
(iv) EBSU accepts HND /ND /NCE pass at 
credit/merit level in relevant 
programmes/subjects in addition to the 'O' 
level requirement. ND must be at upper credit 
level.  
(v) ILORIN accepts ND upper credit in Public 
Administration or Local Government Studies 
and HND lower credit or Advanced Diploma in  
Public Administration from Accredited 
Tertiary Institutions in addition to meeting the 
UTME requirements.  
(vi) NASARAWA  accepts  History  In 
 lieu  of Government.  
  
(vii) OAU accepts   
a) Three (3) ‘A’ level passes plus the UTME 
requirements in Economics, Government 
or History and Geography.  
b) ND  upper  credit  pass  in 
 Public  
Administration, Business Administration, 
Statistics and Accountancy or University Diploma 
 with  merit  in  Public  
Administration or Local Government.
